# sse Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "sse" {
  # Configuration is loaded from environment variables:
  # SSE_CLIENT_ID
  # SSE_CLIENT_SECRET
  # SSE_TOKEN_URL
  # SSE_REGION (optional, defaults to "us", use "eu" for Europe)
}
```
